QuickActionListItem.name: QuickActionListItem
QuickActionListItem.description: Represents an item in a quick action list.

QuickActionDefinition.description: The enum name or ID of the QuickActionDefinition thatâ€™s associated with this list item. Valid values are: Case.ChangeStatus Case.LogACall FeedItem.ContentPost FeedItem.LinkPost FeedItem.MobileSmartActions FeedItem.PollPost FeedItem.QuestionPost FeedItem.TextPost

QuickActionListId.description: The ID of the QuickActionList associated with this list item.

SortOrder.description: The order in which this list item appears in the picklist. This field must be an ordinal number greater than 0, and must be unique in the list.
